verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> Now these [are] the words הַסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> of the letter אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> sent יִרְמְיָ֥ה <WH3414> that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet מִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> to יֶ֜תֶר <WH3499> unto the residue זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> of the elders הַגּוֹלָ֗ה <WH1473> which were carried away captives וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> and to the priests וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> and to the prophets וְאֶל־ <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and to all the people אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הֶגְלָ֧ה <WH1540> had carried away captive נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֛ר <WH5019> whom Nebuchadnezzar מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> to Babylon

אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> (After צֵ֣את <WH3318> were departed יְכָנְיָֽה־ <WH3204> that Jeconiah הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְהַגְּבִירָ֨ה <WH1377> and the queen וְהַסָּרִיסִ֜ים <WH5631> and the eunuchs שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> the princes יְהוּדָ֧ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem וְהֶחָרָ֥שׁ <WH2796> and the carpenters וְהַמַּסְגֵּ֖ר <WH4525> and the smiths מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem

בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> By the hand אֶלְעָשָׂ֣ה <WH501> of Elasah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֔ן <WH8227> of Shaphan וּגְמַרְיָ֖ה <WH1587> and Gemariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּ֑ה <WH2518> of Hilkiah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֜ח <WH7971> sent צִדְקִיָּ֣ה <WH6667> (whom Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֛ר <WH5019> to Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> unto Babylon בָּבֶ֥לָה <WH894> of Babylon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַ֨גּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> unto all that are carried away captives אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִגְלֵ֥יתִי <WH1540> whom I have caused to be carried away מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> unto Babylon

בְּנ֥וּ <WH1129> Build בָתִּ֖ים <WH1004> ye houses וְשֵׁ֑בוּ <WH3427> and dwell וְנִטְע֣וּ <WH5193> [in them] and plant גַנּ֔וֹת <WH1593> gardens וְאִכְל֖וּ <WH398> and eat אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְיָֽן׃ <WH6529> the fruit

קְח֣וּ <WH3947> Take נָשִׁ֗ים <WH802> ye wives וְהוֹלִידוּ֮ <WH3205> and beget בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנוֹת֒ <WH1323> and daughters וּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> and take לִבְנֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1121> for your sons נָשִׁ֗ים <WH802> wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1323> your daughters תְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> to husbands וְתֵלַ֖דְנָה <WH3205> that they may bear בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> and daughters וּרְבוּ־ <WH7235> that ye may be increased שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְעָֽטוּ׃ <WH4591> there and not diminished

וְדִרְשׁ֞וּ <WH1875> And seek אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> the peace הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> of the city אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I הִגְלֵ֤יתִי <WH1540> whither I have caused you to be carried away captives אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> in it וְהִתְפַּֽלְל֥וּ <WH6419> and pray בַעֲדָ֖הּ <WH1157> behalf אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> its בִשְׁלוֹמָ֔הּ <WH7965> for it for in the peace יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֖ם שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> thereof shall ye have peace פ

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אַל־ <WH408> nay יַשִּׁ֧יאוּ <WH5377> of you deceive לָכֶ֛ם נְבִֽיאֵיכֶ֥ם <WH5030> Let not your prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֖ם <WH7130> that [be] in the midst וְקֹֽסְמֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7080> and your diviners וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> you neither hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲלֹמֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2472> to your dreams אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you מַחְלְמִֽים׃ <WH2492> which ye cause to be dreamed

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְשֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> falsely הֵ֛ם <WH1992> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> For they prophesy לָכֶ֖ם בִּשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> unto you in my name לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁלַחְתִּ֖ים <WH7971> I have not sent נְאֻם־ <WH5002> them saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֠י <WH3588> When לְפִ֞י <WH6310> That after מְלֹ֧את <WH4390> be accomplished לְבָבֶ֛ל <WH894> at Babylon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years אֶפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> I will visit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <WH6965> you and perform עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרִ֣י <WH1697> word הַטּ֔וֹב <WH2896> my good לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> toward you in causing you to return אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> to this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> I יָדַ֜עְתִּי <WH3045> For I know אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּחֲשָׁבֹ֗ת <WH4284> the thoughts אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I חֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH2803> that I think עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> and נְאֻם־ <WH5002> toward you saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD מַחְשְׁב֤וֹת <WH4284> thoughts שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> of peace וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> and not of evil לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָכֶ֖ם אַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> end וְתִקְוָֽה׃ <WH8615> you an expected

וּקְרָאתֶ֤ם <WH7121> Then shall ye call אֹתִי֙ <WH853> וַֽהֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> upon me and ye shall go וְהִתְפַּלַּלְתֶּ֖ם <WH6419> and pray אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וְשָׁמַעְתִּ֖י <WH8085> unto me and I will hearken אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּ֥ם <WH1245> And ye shall seek אֹתִ֖י <WH853> וּמְצָאתֶ֑ם <WH4672> me and find כִּ֥י <WH3588> when תִדְרְשֻׁ֖נִי <WH1875> [me] when ye shall search בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <WH3824> for me with all your heart

וְנִמְצֵ֣אתִי <WH4672> And I will be found לָכֶם֮ נְאֻם־ <WH5002> of you saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD וְשַׁבְתִּ֣י <WH7725> and I will turn away אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִיתְכֶם כ] (שְׁבוּתְכֶ֗ם <WH7622> captive ק) וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <WH6908> and I will gather אֶ֠תְכֶם <WH853> מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <WH1471> you from all the nations וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקוֹמ֗וֹת <WH4725> and from all the places אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I הִדַּ֧חְתִּי <WH5080> whither I have driven אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it נְאֻם־ <WH5002> you saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֣י <WH7725> and I will bring you again אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> into the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I הִגְלֵ֥יתִי <WH1540> whence I caused you to be carried away captive אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it
כִּ֖י <WH3588> Because אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH559> Because ye have said הֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> hath raised us up לָ֧נוּ יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD נְבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> prophets בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> in Babylon ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> [Know] that thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> that sitteth אֶל־ <WH413> and concerning כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> upon the throne דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David וְאֶל־ <WH413> concerning כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and of all the people הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that dwelleth בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise אֲחֵיכֶ֕ם <WH251> [and] of your brethren אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not יָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> that are not gone forth אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> into בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> with you into captivity

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold מְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <WH7971> Behold I will send בָּ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> upon them the sword אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> the famine וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and the pestilence וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> and will make אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> כַּתְּאֵנִים֙ <WH8182> them like vile הַשֹּׁ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH8384> figs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <WH398> that cannot be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <WH7455> they are so evil

וְרָֽדַפְתִּי֙ <WH7291> And I will persecute אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> them בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> with the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> with the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and with the pestilence וּנְתַתִּ֨ים <WH5414> and will deliver [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֜ה <WH2113> be removed ק) לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> to all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> to all the kingdoms הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְאָלָ֤ה <WH423> to be a curse וּלְשַׁמָּה֙ <WH8047> and an astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֣ה <WH8322> and an hissing וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <WH2781> and a reproach בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among all the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I הִדַּחְתִּ֥ים <WH5080> whither I have driven שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Because they have not hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to דְּבָרַ֖י <WH1697> to my words נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which שָׁלַ֨חְתִּי <WH7971> which I sent אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH854> by עֲבָדַ֤י <WH5650> unto them by my servants הַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֔חַ <WH7971> and sending וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> [them] but ye would not hear נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> ye therefore the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֨גּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> all ye of the captivity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> whom I have sent מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> to Babylon ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> concerning אַחְאָ֤ב <WH256> of Ahab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קֽוֹלָיָה֙ <WH6964> of Kolaiah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and concerning צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> and of Zedekiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַֽעֲשֵׂיָ֔ה <WH4641> of Maaseiah הַֽנִּבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> which prophesy לָכֶ֛ם בִּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> unto you in my name שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> a lie הִנְנִ֣י ׀ <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> Behold I will deliver אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> them into the hand נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְהִכָּ֖ם <WH5221> and he shall slay לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> them before your eyes
